articles.author: Shubhajit Roy
articles.title: Explained: The significance of PM Modi’s Europe tour - The Indian Express
articles.description: Modi will be visiting Germany, Denmark and France from May 2. What will be on the table in the context of the Ukraine crisis, and economic and defence ties?
articles.content:
Germany
Germany is one of Indias most important partners in Europe, with deep bilateral relations, and also because of its key role in the European Union. India was among the first countries to esta… [+6368 chars]

articles.title: EU leans towards Russian oil ban by year-end, diplomats say - Reuters.com
articles.description: The European Union is leaning toward a ban on imports of Russian oil by the end of the year, two EU diplomats said, after talks between the European Commission and EU member states this weekend.
articles.content: BRUSSELS, May 1 (Reuters) - The European Union is leaning toward a ban on imports of Russian oil by the end of the year, two EU diplomats said, after talks between the European Commission and EU memb… [+2219 chars]

articles.description: House speaker leads first US Congressional delegation to visit Ukraine since Russian invasion.
articles.content:
